These 5 protocols are from protocols published in lab manuals or in commercially available kits.

The original sources of the protocols are:

1. DNA Sequencing - Applied BioSystems Manual.

2. Miniprep - Preparation of Plasmid DNA by Alkaline Lysis with SDS:Minipreparation protocol, Molecular Cloning : A Laboratory Manual, Volume 1, Sambrook and Russell.

3. Qiagen plasmid purification high yield - Qiagen kit.

4. Qiagen plasmid purification standard protocol - Qiagen kit.

5. yeast transformation - Methods in yeast genetics, Amberg et al.
